parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of barcode to generate.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: Text to encode.

parameters.name: TwoDDisplayText
parameters.description:
Text that will be displayed instead of codetext in 2D barcodes.
Used for: Aztec, Pdf417, DataMatrix, QR, MaxiCode, DotCode

parameters.name: TextLocation
parameters.description:
Specify the displaying Text Location, set to CodeLocation.None to hide CodeText.
Default value: CodeLocation.Below.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.description: Text alignment.

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.description:
Specify the displaying CodeText's Color.
Default value: Color.Black.

parameters.name: FontSizeMode
parameters.description:
Specify FontSizeMode. If FontSizeMode is set to Auto, font size will be calculated automatically based on xDimension value.
It is recommended to use FontSizeMode.Auto especially in AutoSizeMode.Nearest or AutoSizeMode.Interpolation.
Default value: FontSizeMode.Auto.

parameters.name: NoWrap
parameters.description:
Specify word wraps (line breaks) within text.
Default value: false.

parameters.name: Resolution
parameters.description:
Resolution of the BarCode image.
One value for both dimensions.
Default value: 96 dpi.

parameters.name: ResolutionX
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'Resolution' instead.

parameters.name: ResolutionY
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'Resolution' instead.

parameters.name: DimensionX
parameters.description:
The smallest width of the unit of BarCode bars or spaces.
Increase this will increase the whole barcode image width.
Ignored if AutoSizeMode property is set to AutoSizeMode.Nearest or AutoSizeMode.Interpolation.

parameters.name: TextSpace
parameters.description:
Space between the CodeText and the BarCode in Unit value.
Default value: 2pt.
Ignored for EAN8, EAN13, UPCE, UPCA, ISBN, ISMN, ISSN, UpcaGs1DatabarCoupon.

parameters.name: Units
parameters.description: Common Units for all measuring in query. Default units: pixel.

parameters.name: SizeMode
parameters.description:
Specifies the different types of automatic sizing modes.
Default value: AutoSizeMode.None.

parameters.name: BarHeight
parameters.description: Height of the barcode in given units. Default units: pixel.

parameters.name: ImageHeight
parameters.description: Height of the barcode image in given units. Default units: pixel.

parameters.name: ImageWidth
parameters.description: Width of the barcode image in given units. Default units: pixel.

parameters.name: RotationAngle
parameters.description:
BarCode image rotation angle, measured in degree, e.g. RotationAngle = 0 or RotationAngle = 360 means no rotation.
If RotationAngle NOT equal to 90, 180, 270 or 0, it may increase the difficulty for the scanner to read the image.
Default value: 0.

parameters.name: BackColor
parameters.description:
Background color of the barcode image.
Default value: Color.White.

parameters.name: BarColor
parameters.description:
Bars color.
Default value: Color.Black.

parameters.name: BorderColor
parameters.description:
Border color.
Default value: Color.Black.

parameters.name: BorderWidth
parameters.description:
Border width.
Default value: 0.
Ignored if Visible is set to false.

parameters.name: BorderDashStyle
parameters.description:
Border dash style.
Default value: BorderDashStyle.Solid.

parameters.name: BorderVisible
parameters.description:
Border visibility. If false than parameter Width is always ignored (0).
Default value: false.

parameters.name: EnableChecksum
parameters.description:
Enable checksum during generation 1D barcodes.
Default is treated as Yes for symbology which must contain checksum, as No where checksum only possible.
Checksum is possible: Code39 Standard/Extended, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, DeutschePostIdentcode, DeutschePostLeitcode, VIN, Codabar
Checksum always used: Rest symbology

parameters.name: EnableEscape
parameters.description:
Indicates whether explains the character "\" as an escape character in CodeText property. Used for Pdf417, DataMatrix, Code128 only
If the EnableEscape is true, "\" will be explained as a special escape character. Otherwise, "\" acts as normal characters.
Aspose.BarCode supports input decimal ascii code and mnemonic for ASCII control-code characters. For example, \013 and \\CR stands for CR.

parameters.name: FilledBars
parameters.description:
Value indicating whether bars are filled.
Only for 1D barcodes.
Default value: true.

parameters.name: AlwaysShowChecksum
parameters.description: Always display checksum digit in the human readable text for Code128 and GS1Code128 barcodes.

parameters.name: WideNarrowRatio
parameters.description:
Wide bars to Narrow bars ratio.
Default value: 3, that is, wide bars are 3 times as wide as narrow bars.
Used for ITF, PZN, PharmaCode, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, IATA2of5, VIN, DeutschePost, OPC, Code32, DataLogic2of5, PatchCode, Code39Extended, Code39Standard

parameters.name: ValidateText
parameters.description:
Only for 1D barcodes.
If codetext is incorrect and value set to true - exception will be thrown. Otherwise codetext will be corrected to match barcode's specification.
Exception always will be thrown for: Databar symbology if codetext is incorrect.
Exception always will not be thrown for: AustraliaPost, SingaporePost, Code39Extended, Code93Extended, Code16K, Code128 symbology if codetext is incorrect.

parameters.name: SupplementData
parameters.description:
Supplement parameters.
Used for Interleaved2of5, Standard2of5, EAN13, EAN8, UPCA, UPCE, ISBN, ISSN, ISMN.

parameters.name: SupplementSpace
parameters.description: Space between main the BarCode and supplement BarCode.

parameters.name: BarWidthReduction
parameters.description: Bars reduction value that is used to compensate ink spread while printing.

parameters.name: UseAntiAlias
parameters.description: Indicates whether is used anti-aliasing mode to render image. Anti-aliasing mode is applied to barcode and text drawing.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Result image format.

put.summary: Generate barcode and save on server (from query params or from file with json or xml content)

Border visibility. If false than parameter Width is always ignored (0).

Enable checksum during generation 1D barcodes.
Default is treated as Yes for symbology which must contain checksum, as No where checksum only possible.
Checksum is possible: Code39 Standard/Extended, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, DeutschePostIdentcode, DeutschePostLeitcode, VIN, Codabar

parameters.name: EnableEscape

Indicates whether explains the character "\" as an escape character in CodeText property. Used for Pdf417, DataMatrix, Code128 only
If the EnableEscape is true, "\" will be explained as a special escape character. Otherwise, "\" acts as normal characters.
Aspose.BarCode supports input decimal ascii code and mnemonic for ASCII control-code characters. For example, \013 and \\CR stands for CR.

Value indicating whether bars are filled.
Only for 1D barcodes.

parameters.name: WideNarrowRatio
parameters.description:
Wide bars to Narrow bars ratio.
Default value: 3, that is, wide bars are 3 times as wide as narrow bars.
Used for ITF, PZN, PharmaCode, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, IATA2of5, VIN, DeutschePost, OPC, Code32, DataLogic2of5, PatchCode, Code39Extended, Code39Standard

parameters.name: ValidateText
parameters.description:
Only for 1D barcodes.
If codetext is incorrect and value set to true - exception will be thrown. Otherwise codetext will be corrected to match barcode's specification.
Exception always will be thrown for: Databar symbology if codetext is incorrect.
Exception always will not be thrown for: AustraliaPost, SingaporePost, Code39Extended, Code93Extended, Code16K, Code128 symbology if codetext is incorrect.

parameters.name: SupplementData

Supplement parameters.
Used for Interleaved2of5, Standard2of5, EAN13, EAN8, UPCA, UPCE, ISBN, ISSN, ISMN.

parameters.name: BarWidthReduction
parameters.description: Bars reduction value that is used to compensate ink spread while printing.

parameters.name: UseAntiAlias
parameters.description: Indicates whether is used anti-aliasing mode to render image. Anti-aliasing mode is applied to barcode and text drawing.

parameters.description: The image format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format to return stream in

parameters.description: New filename

parameters.description: Folder to place file to

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: The storage name

get.summary: Recognize barcode from a file on server.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The image file name.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of barcode to read.

parameters.name: ChecksumValidation
parameters.description:
Enable checksum validation during recognition for 1D barcodes.
Default is treated as Yes for symbologies which must contain checksum, as No where checksum only possible.
Checksum never used: Codabar
Checksum is possible: Code39 Standard/Extended, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, DeutschePostIdentcode, DeutschePostLeitcode, VIN
Checksum always used: Rest symbologies

parameters.name: DetectEncoding
parameters.description: A flag which force engine to detect codetext encoding for Unicode.

parameters.name: Preset
parameters.description:
Preset allows to configure recognition quality and speed manually.
You can quickly set up Preset by embedded presets: HighPerformance, NormalQuality,
HighQuality, MaxBarCodes or you can manually configure separate options.
Default value of Preset is NormalQuality.

parameters.name: RectX
parameters.description: Set X of top left corner of area for recognition.

parameters.name: RectY
parameters.description: Set Y of top left corner of area for recognition.

parameters.name: RectWidth
parameters.description: Set Width of area for recognition.

parameters.name: RectHeight
parameters.description: Set Height of area for recognition.

parameters.name: StripFNC
parameters.description: Value indicating whether FNC symbol strip must be done.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description:
Timeout of recognition process in milliseconds.
Default value is 15_000 (15 seconds).
Maximum value is 60_000 (1 minute).
In case of a timeout RequestTimeout (408) status will be returned.
Try reducing the image size to avoid timeout.

parameters.name: MedianSmoothingWindowSize
parameters.description: Window size for median smoothing. Typical values are 3 or 4. Default value is 3. AllowMedianSmoothing must be set.

parameters.name: AllowMedianSmoothing
parameters.description: Allows engine to enable median smoothing as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised barcodes.

parameters.name: AllowComplexBackground
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize color barcodes on color background as additional scan. Extremely slow mode.

parameters.name: AllowDatamatrixIndustrialBarcodes
parameters.description:
Allows engine for Datamatrix to recognize dashed industrial Datamatrix barcodes.
Slow mode which helps only for dashed barcodes which consist from spots.

parameters.name: AllowDecreasedImage
parameters.description:
Allows engine to recognize decreased image as additional scan. Size for decreasing is selected by internal engine algorithms.
Mode helps to recognize barcodes which are noised and blurred but captured with high resolution.

parameters.name: AllowDetectScanGap
parameters.description: Allows engine to use gap between scans to increase recognition speed. Mode can make recognition problems with low height barcodes.

parameters.name: AllowIncorrectBarcodes
parameters.description:
Allows engine to recognize barcodes which has incorrect checksum or incorrect values.
Mode can be used to recognize damaged barcodes with incorrect text.

parameters.name: AllowInvertImage
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize inverse color image as additional scan. Mode can be used when barcode is white on black background.

parameters.name: AllowMicroWhiteSpotsRemoving
parameters.description: Allows engine for Postal barcodes to recognize slightly noised images. Mode helps to recognize slightly damaged Postal barcodes.

parameters.name: AllowOneDFastBarcodesDetector
parameters.description:
Allows engine for 1D barcodes to quickly recognize high quality barcodes which fill almost whole image.
Mode helps to quickly recognize generated barcodes from Internet.

parameters.name: AllowOneDWipedBarsRestoration
parameters.description: Allows engine for 1D barcodes to recognize barcodes with single wiped/glued bars in pattern.

parameters.name: AllowQRMicroQrRestoration
parameters.description: Allows engine for QR/MicroQR to recognize damaged MicroQR barcodes.

parameters.name: AllowRegularImage
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize regular image without any restorations as main scan. Mode to recognize image as is.

parameters.name: AllowSaltAndPepperFiltering
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize barcodes with salt and pepper noise type. Mode can remove small noise with white and black dots.

parameters.name: AllowWhiteSpotsRemoving
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize image without small white spots as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised image as well as median smoothing filtering.

parameters.name: CheckMore1DVariants
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize 1D barcodes with checksum by checking more recognition variants. Default value: False.

parameters.name: FastScanOnly
parameters.description:
Allows engine for 1D barcodes to quickly recognize middle slice of an image and return result without using any time-consuming algorithms.
Default value: False.

parameters.name: RegionLikelihoodThresholdPercent
parameters.description:
Sets threshold for detected regions that may contain barcodes.
Value 0.7 means that bottom 70% of possible regions are filtered out and not processed further.
Region likelihood threshold must be between [0.05, 0.9]
Use high values for clear images with few barcodes.
Use low values for images with many barcodes or for noisy images.
Low value may lead to a bigger recognition time.

parameters.name: ScanWindowSizes
parameters.description:
Scan window sizes in pixels.
Allowed sizes are 10, 15, 20, 25, 30.
Scanning with small window size takes more time and provides more accuracy but may fail in detecting very big barcodes.
Combining of several window sizes can improve detection quality.

parameters.name: Similarity
parameters.description:
Similarity coefficient depends on how homogeneous barcodes are.
Use high value for for clear barcodes.
Use low values to detect barcodes that ara partly damaged or not lighten evenly.
Similarity coefficient must be between [0.5, 0.9]

parameters.name: SkipDiagonalSearch
parameters.description:
Allows detector to skip search for diagonal barcodes.
Setting it to false will increase detection time but allow to find diagonal barcodes that can be missed otherwise.
Enabling of diagonal search leads to a bigger detection time.

parameters.name: ReadTinyBarcodes
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize tiny barcodes on large images. Ignored if AllowIncorrectBarcodes is set to True. Default value: False.

parameters.name: AustralianPostEncodingTable
parameters.description: Interpreting Type for the Customer Information of AustralianPost BarCode.Default is CustomerInformationInterpretingType.Other.

parameters.name: IgnoreEndingFillingPatternsForCTable
parameters.description:
The flag which force AustraliaPost decoder to ignore last filling patterns in Customer Information Field during decoding as CTable method.
CTable encoding method does not have any gaps in encoding table and sequence "333" of filling patterns is decoded as letter "z".

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: The image storage.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The image folder.

put.summary: Recognition of a barcode from file on server with parameters in body.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The image file name.

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: The storage name

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The image folder.

post.summary:
Recognize barcode from an url or from request body.
Request body can contain raw data bytes of the image with content-type "application/octet-stream".
An image can also be passed as a form field.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of barcode to read.

parameters.name: ChecksumValidation
parameters.description:
Enable checksum validation during recognition for 1D barcodes.
Default is treated as Yes for symbologies which must contain checksum, as No where checksum only possible.
Checksum never used: Codabar
Checksum is possible: Code39 Standard/Extended, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, DeutschePostIdentcode, DeutschePostLeitcode, VIN
Checksum always used: Rest symbologies

HighQuality, MaxBarCodes or you can manually configure separate options.
Default value of Preset is NormalQuality.

parameters.name: RectX

parameters.name: RectY
parameters.description: Set Y of top left corner of area for recognition.

parameters.name: RectWidth
parameters.description: Set Width of area for recognition.

parameters.name: RectHeight
parameters.description: Set Height of area for recognition.

parameters.name: StripFNC

parameters.name: AllowMedianSmoothing
parameters.description: Allows engine to enable median smoothing as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised barcodes.

parameters.name: AllowRegularImage

parameters.name: AllowSaltAndPepperFiltering
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize barcodes with salt and pepper noise type. Mode can remove small noise with white and black dots.

parameters.name: AllowWhiteSpotsRemoving
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize image without small white spots as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised image as well as median smoothing filtering.

parameters.name: CheckMore1DVariants
parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize 1D barcodes with checksum by checking more recognition variants. Default value: False.

parameters.name: FastScanOnly

Value 0.7 means that bottom 70% of possible regions are filtered out and not processed further.
Region likelihood threshold must be between [0.05, 0.9]
Use high values for clear images with few barcodes.

Scanning with small window size takes more time and provides more accuracy but may fail in detecting very big barcodes.
Combining of several window sizes can improve detection quality.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description:
Path where to upload including filename and extension e.g. /file.ext or /Folder 1/file.ext
 If the content is multipart and path does not contains the file name it tries to get them from filename parameter
 from Content-Disposition header.

get.summary: Get all files and folders within a folder

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Folder path e.g. '/folder'

parameters.name: storageName
parameters.description: Storage name

200.description: Returns all files and folders contained by the folder.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

404.description: Can't find folder for given path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Folder path to create e.g. 'folder_1/folder_2/'

parameters.name: storageName
parameters.description: Storage name

200.description: Returns 200 if the create is successful.

400.description: Storage not found or it is not associated with the application.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Folder path e.g. '/folder'

parameters.name: storageName
parameters.description: Storage name

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Enable to delete folders, subfolders and files

200.description: Returns 200 if the delete is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired

parameters.description: Source folder path e.g. '/src'

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

XStep.description: Shift step according to X axis

YStep.description: Shift step according to Y axis

TwoDDisplayText.description:
Text that will be displayed instead of codetext in 2D barcodes.
Used for: Aztec, Pdf417, DataMatrix, QR, MaxiCode, DotCode

TextColor.description:
Specify the displaying CodeText's Color.
Default value: Color.Black.

NoWrap.description:
Specify word wraps (line breaks) within text.
Default value: false.

Resolution.description:
Resolution of the BarCode image.
One value for both dimensions.
Default value: 96 dpi.

DimensionX.description:
The smallest width of the unit of BarCode bars or spaces.
Increase this will increase the whole barcode image width.
Ignored if AutoSizeMode property is set to AutoSizeMode.Nearest or AutoSizeMode.Interpolation.

TextSpace.description:
Space between the CodeText and the BarCode in Unit value.
Default value: 2pt.
Ignored for EAN8, EAN13, UPCE, UPCA, ISBN, ISMN, ISSN, UpcaGs1DatabarCoupon.

BarHeight.description: Height of the barcode in given units. Default units: pixel.

ImageHeight.description: Height of the barcode image in given units. Default units: pixel.

ImageWidth.description: Width of the barcode image in given units. Default units: pixel.

RotationAngle.description:
BarCode image rotation angle, measured in degree, e.g. RotationAngle = 0 or RotationAngle = 360 means no rotation.
If RotationAngle NOT equal to 90, 180, 270 or 0, it may increase the difficulty for the scanner to read the image.
Default value: 0.

BackColor.description:
Background color of the barcode image.
Default value: Color.White.

BorderWidth.description:
Border width.
Default value: 0.
Ignored if Visible is set to false.

BorderVisible.description:
Border visibility. If false than parameter Width is always ignored (0).
Default value: false.

EnableEscape.description:
Indicates whether explains the character "\" as an escape character in CodeText property. Used for Pdf417, DataMatrix, Code128 only
If the EnableEscape is true, "\" will be explained as a special escape character. Otherwise, "\" acts as normal characters.
Aspose.BarCode supports input decimal ascii code and mnemonic for ASCII control-code characters. For example, \013 and \\CR stands for CR.

FilledBars.description:
Value indicating whether bars are filled.
Only for 1D barcodes.
Default value: true.

AlwaysShowChecksum.description: Always display checksum digit in the human readable text for Code128 and GS1Code128 barcodes.

WideNarrowRatio.description:
Wide bars to Narrow bars ratio.
Default value: 3, that is, wide bars are 3 times as wide as narrow bars.
Used for ITF, PZN, PharmaCode, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, IATA2of5, VIN, DeutschePost, OPC, Code32, DataLogic2of5, PatchCode, Code39Extended, Code39Standard

ValidateText.description:
Only for 1D barcodes.
If codetext is incorrect and value set to true - exception will be thrown. Otherwise codetext will be corrected to match barcode's specification.
Exception always will be thrown for: Databar symbology if codetext is incorrect.
Exception always will not be thrown for: AustraliaPost, SingaporePost, Code39Extended, Code93Extended, Code16K, Code128 symbology if codetext is incorrect.

SupplementData.description:
Supplement parameters.
Used for Interleaved2of5, Standard2of5, EAN13, EAN8, UPCA, UPCE, ISBN, ISSN, ISMN.

SupplementSpace.description: Space between main the BarCode and supplement BarCode.

BarWidthReduction.description: Bars reduction value that is used to compensate ink spread while printing.

UseAntiAlias.description: Indicates whether is used anti-aliasing mode to render image. Anti-aliasing mode is applied to barcode and text drawing.

NoWrap.description:
Specify word wraps (line breaks) within text.
Default value: false.

ShortBarHeight.description: Short bar's height of AustralianPost barcode.

ErrorLevel.description:
Level of error correction of Aztec types of barcode.
Value should between 10 to 95.

QuietZoneLeftCoef.description:
Size of the left quiet zone in xDimension.
Default value: 10, meaning if xDimension = 2px than left quiet zone will be 20px.

QuietZoneRightCoef.description:
Size of the right quiet zone in xDimension.
Default value: 1, meaning if xDimension = 2px than right quiet zone will be 2px.

SupplementSpace.description: Space between main the BarCode and supplement BarCode in Unit value.

CouponParams.description: Coupon parameters. Used for UpcaGs1DatabarCoupon, UpcaGs1Code128Coupon.

AspectRatio.description:
Height/Width ratio of 2D BarCode module.
Used for DataBar stacked.

Is2DCompositeComponent.description: Enables flag of 2D composite component with DataBar barcode

IsAllowOnlyGS1Encoding.description: If this flag is set, it allows only GS1 encoding standard for Databar barcode types

Columns.description:
DEPRECATED: Will be replaced with 'DataMatrix.Version' in the next release
 Columns count.

Rows.description:
DEPRECATED: Will be replaced with 'DataMatrix.Version' in the next release
 Rows count.

DataMatrixEncodeMode.description: DataMatrix encoder's encoding mode, default to Auto

Columns.description: Identifies columns count. Sum of the number of rows plus the number of columns of a DotCode symbol must be odd. Number of columns must be at least 5.

IsReaderInitialization.description: Indicates whether code is used for instruct reader to interpret the following data as instructions for initialization or reprogramming of the bar code reader. Default value is false.

Rows.description: Identifies rows count. Sum of the number of rows plus the number of columns of a DotCode symbol must be odd. Number of rows must be at least 5.

BorderThickness.description:
ITF border (bearer bar) thickness in Unit value.
Default value: 12pt.

QuietZoneCoef.description:
Size of the quiet zones in xDimension.
Default value: 10, meaning if xDimension = 2px than quiet zones will be 20px.

MacroFileID.description:
Macro Pdf417 barcode's file ID.
Used for MacroPdf417.

MacroSegmentID.description: Macro Pdf417 barcode's segment ID, which starts from 0, to MacroSegmentsCount - 1.

Truncate.description: Whether Pdf417 symbology type of BarCode is truncated (to reduce space).

IsReaderInitialization.description:
Used to instruct the reader to interpret the data contained within the symbol
as programming for reader initialization

MacroFileSize.description:
Macro Pdf417 file size.
The file size field contains the size in bytes of the entire source file

MacroChecksum.description:
Macro Pdf417 barcode checksum.
The checksum field contains the value of the 16-bit (2 bytes) CRC checksum using the CCITT-16 polynomial

ShortBarHeight.description: Short bar's height of Postal barcodes.

PostalParams.description: Postal parameters. Used for Postnet, Planet.

SequenceIndicator.description: The index of the QR structured append mode barcode. Index starts from 0.

TotalCount.description: QR structured append mode barcodes quantity. Max value is 16.

ParityByte.description: QR structured append mode parity data.

ExtraBarcodeText.description: Specifies codetext for an extra QR barcode, when PatchCode is generated in page mode.

Barcodes.description: List of barcodes which are present in image.

RegionPoint.description: Wrapper around Drawing.Point for proper specification.

PresetType.description:
See QualitySettings
allows to configure recognition quality and speed manually.

DetectEncoding.description: A flag which force engine to detect codetext encoding for Unicode.

RectX.description: Set X of top left corner of area for recognition.

RectY.description: Set Y of top left corner of area for recognition.

RectWidth.description: Set Width of area for recognition.

RectHeight.description: Set Height of area for recognition.

StripFNC.description: Value indicating whether FNC symbol strip must be done.

Timeout.description:
Timeout of recognition process in milliseconds.
Default value is 15_000 (15 seconds).
Maximum value is 60_000 (1 minute).
In case of a timeout RequestTimeout (408) status will be returned.
Try reducing the image size to avoid timeout.

MedianSmoothingWindowSize.description: Window size for median smoothing. Typical values are 3 or 4. Default value is 3. AllowMedianSmoothing must be set.

AllowMedianSmoothing.description: Allows engine to enable median smoothing as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised barcodes.

AllowComplexBackground.description: Allows engine to recognize color barcodes on color background as additional scan. Extremely slow mode.

AllowDatamatrixIndustrialBarcodes.description:
Allows engine for Datamatrix to recognize dashed industrial Datamatrix barcodes.
Slow mode which helps only for dashed barcodes which consist from spots.

AllowDecreasedImage.description:
Allows engine to recognize decreased image as additional scan. Size for decreasing is selected by internal engine algorithms.
Mode helps to recognize barcodes which are noised and blurred but captured with high resolution.

AllowDetectScanGap.description: Allows engine to use gap between scans to increase recognition speed. Mode can make recognition problems with low height barcodes.

AllowIncorrectBarcodes.description:
Allows engine to recognize barcodes which has incorrect checksum or incorrect values.
Mode can be used to recognize damaged barcodes with incorrect text.

AllowInvertImage.description: Allows engine to recognize inverse color image as additional scan. Mode can be used when barcode is white on black background.

AllowMicroWhiteSpotsRemoving.description: Allows engine for Postal barcodes to recognize slightly noised images. Mode helps to recognize slightly damaged Postal barcodes.

AllowOneDFastBarcodesDetector.description:
Allows engine for 1D barcodes to quickly recognize high quality barcodes which fill almost whole image.
Mode helps to quickly recognize generated barcodes from Internet.

AllowOneDWipedBarsRestoration.description: Allows engine for 1D barcodes to recognize barcodes with single wiped/glued bars in pattern.

AllowQRMicroQrRestoration.description: Allows engine for QR/MicroQR to recognize damaged MicroQR barcodes.

AllowRegularImage.description: Allows engine to recognize regular image without any restorations as main scan. Mode to recognize image as is.

AllowSaltAndPepperFiltering.description: Allows engine to recognize barcodes with salt and pepper noise type. Mode can remove small noise with white and black dots.

AllowWhiteSpotsRemoving.description: Allows engine to recognize image without small white spots as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised image as well as median smoothing filtering.

CheckMore1DVariants.description: Allows engine to recognize 1D barcodes with checksum by checking more recognition variants. Default value: False.

FastScanOnly.description:
Allows engine for 1D barcodes to quickly recognize middle slice of an image and return result without using any time-consuming algorithms.
Default value: False.

RegionLikelihoodThresholdPercent.description:
Sets threshold for detected regions that may contain barcodes.
Value 0.7 means that bottom 70% of possible regions are filtered out and not processed further.
Region likelihood threshold must be between [0.05, 0.9]
Use high values for clear images with few barcodes.
Use low values for images with many barcodes or for noisy images.
Low value may lead to a bigger recognition time.

ScanWindowSizes.description:
Scan window sizes in pixels.
Allowed sizes are 10, 15, 20, 25, 30.
Scanning with small window size takes more time and provides more accuracy but may fail in detecting very big barcodes.
Combining of several window sizes can improve detection quality.

Similarity.description:
Similarity coefficient depends on how homogeneous barcodes are.
Use high value for for clear barcodes.
Use low values to detect barcodes that ara partly damaged or not lighten evenly.
Similarity coefficient must be between [0.5, 0.9]

SkipDiagonalSearch.description:
Allows detector to skip search for diagonal barcodes.
Setting it to false will increase detection time but allow to find diagonal barcodes that can be missed otherwise.
Enabling of diagonal search leads to a bigger detection time.

ReadTinyBarcodes.description: Allows engine to recognize tiny barcodes on large images. Ignored if AllowIncorrectBarcodes is set to True. Default value: False.

IgnoreEndingFillingPatternsForCTable.description:
The flag which force AustraliaPost decoder to ignore last filling patterns in Customer Information Field during decoding as CTable method.
CTable encoding method does not have any gaps in encoding table and sequence "333" of filling patterns is decoded as letter "z".

Value.description: Files and folders contained by folder StorageFile.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

Exists.description: Indicates that the file or folder exists.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder, false if it is a file.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.
